unnormalised: **Automotive Buzz: Mumbai Traffic Gets a Holi Makeover!**
normalised: **Automotive Buzz: Mumbai Traffic Gets a Holi Makeover!**

unnormalised: Mumbai, October 26th: Get ready, Mumbaikars! Traffic regulations are getting a shake-up just in time for the festive season – Diwali is around the corner, and nobody wants to be stuck in a jam missing out on the yummy ladoos!
normalised: Mumbai, twenty sixth October: Get ready, Mumbaikars! Traffic regulations are getting a shake-up just in time for the festive season – Diwali is around the corner, and nobody wants to be stuck in a jam missing out on the yummy ladoos!

unnormalised: New rules are being rolled out across the city, particularly around Dadar and Bandra, aiming to ease congestion. Think tighter enforcement on parking near Crawford Market – those Rs. 2000 fines are reportedly actually happening now!
normalised: New rules are being rolled out across the city, particularly around Dadar and Bandra, aiming to ease congestion. Think tighter enforcement on parking near Crawford Market – those rupee two thousand fines are reportedly actually happening now!

unnormalised: Expect more diversions during peak hours, especially near major pandals.
normalised: Expect more diversions during peak hours, especially near major pandals.

unnormalised: The Mumbai Traffic Police are using AI to analyze bottlenecks and optimize signal timings – a real game-changer, hopefully! They've also promised more marshals on the streets to guide traffic.
normalised: The Mumbai Traffic Police are using A I to analyze bottlenecks and optimize signal timings – a real game-changer, hopefully! They've also promised more marshals on the streets to guide traffic.

unnormalised: Remember that new "No Honking" zone near Lilavati Hospital? Seriously, folks, let’s keep it down – no amount of honking will conjure up biryani faster.
normalised: Remember that new "No Honking" zone near Lilavati Hospital? Seriously, folks, let’s keep it down – no amount of honking will conjure up biryani faster.

unnormalised: Word on the street is there are talks to implement odd-even rule for cars based on registration numbers on some roads to improve traffic flow. Imagine that!
normalised: Word on the street is there are talks to implement odd-even rule for cars based on registration numbers on some roads to improve traffic flow. Imagine that!

unnormalised: Drive safe, plan ahead, and happy Diwali!
normalised: Drive safe, plan ahead, and happy Diwali!
